title: I'm laughing at riot over this / but seriously please fix this
body: if you create rune page and title it with support it will  block out the word support, so even knowing riot abuses the word and calls it the name of one of their lanes and all that. It's not ok to label a rune page with the name of the position that rune page is for.

replies.body: Laugh it up! It's an issue we're dealing with at the moment where the filter system is blocking words that make no sense. Programming is a fickle, fickle thing...apparently. Anyway, you'll be happy to know we're on top of it.
thx I left the starred out word on my rune page for fun but since I recently started supporting more I look forward to the fix whenever it occurs.
